verbs.description: 1 . [ARG0: Trump team] [V: heads] [ARG1: to Asia] : A trade war with China was once unthinkable . Now , that nightmare scenario is sitting atop Wall Street 's worry list . The fear is that confrontation between the world 's two biggest economies derails trade , destabilizing the global economy .

The fear is that confrontation between the world 's two biggest economies derails trade , destabilizing the global economy .
